column5: I am sure you can try spin it any way you want but in the end Kessel is a good player and on the right team a great goal scorer.Teams are made up of "Kessels"so yes Kessels DO win games.How does the fact that they dont boo Komi in T.O and the Leafs defence sucks prove Montreal was glad to see him go??  Oh and as Leaf fans we do see scores,know stats and standings as well.So next time you get the urge to tell us the Leafs suck  WE ALREADY KNOW .
hahahaha  go habs go!

Yes I know. Its the second time I did that. And it is the second time I have been corrected but you know who I'm talking about.  Kessel is doing OK. He seems to be changing up his game. How is that draft pick working out for Boston?  Komi has been by far our second best defesemen.  Phaneuf? I dont know if he is trying to hard or what but he has not played great at all....He's still got a great one timer.  I think Kaberle is playing crap on purpose because he hears the rumors. Sundin waved His no trade clause to play for Vancouver so you never know.

Agreed I think Phaneuf is trying to leave his mark offensively and he should be concentrating on the defensive side of things first.I have to laugh though when the Leaf bashers start on phaneuf.They seem to forget what we got rid of to get him not to mention the others that came our way.

No he didn't.  He played out is entire contract with the Leafs and became a free agent when his contract expired.  He then signed with Vancouver as a free agent.  That is why they didn't get anything for him.

I'm not trying to mean, but all this discussion. arguing, and disappointment in the leafs(over the last 40 something years) can all be fixed within a year or two. Stop supporting them! Stop buying their merchandise, stop watching their games. Maybe when the money stops coming in the money will go out to get a better team and bring you all back. Just my 2 cents.

Oh that's right. You can tell I haven't watched hockey in a while. But I'm back on the wagon! Kaberle's no trade clause ended no??Here is what I read.  Ultimately, he signed a contract with the Leafs securing his services through 2005–06. On February 11, 2006, Tomáš Kaberle was re-signed to a five-year contract extension worth $21.25 million with a no-trade clause for the first three years of the contract, effective July 1, 2006. This deal locked him in until the end of the 2010–11 NHL season.  The no trade clause seems to only be for the first three years and his contract ends this year....They should have traded him right after his 3 years were up. He had great market value.

The no trade had an open window which has since closed. Burke tried hard to get twice as much as Kaberle is worth during that open window but wouldn't pull the trigger on any offers he had.  Those draft picks are fine. Tyler Knight is playing great in the juniors and Seguin, who hasn't turned 19 yet, has 8pts at $900,000 compared to Ke$$el's 14pts at $6,000,000. Plus we still have the lottery 1st round pick the Leafs will give us next summer. Ke$$el's 10 goals aren't that impressive when you remember he is also a -4.
leafs and tampa!!! should be exciting headin down to the ACC for some livee stamoks magic
Sooooo jealous. Enjoy man!!!! Stamkos should but on a good show.
I blame Ballard myself..........oh and the teachers.

Per numerous Twitter updates, Joey Crabb, who leads the AHL Marlies with 23 points(9 goals, 14 assists) has been called up for tonight's game vs the Tampa Bay Lightning. Crabb will be placed on the second line with Mikhail Grabovski and Nikolai Kulemin Keith aulie steps back into tge lineup tonite while brett lebda sits out. John mitchell will also be a healthy scratch. he is the best marlie...i have watched 4 or 5 marlie games...he looks good,,,in the ahl.. Go Leafs Go!  lineups for tonite!  MacArthur Kadri Kessel Crabb Grabovski Kulemin Sjostrom Bozak Versteeg Orr Brent Brown
so far so good tonight, 2-1 Leafs with 15:00 min left in the 3rd
Plenty of time to choke left...
Do you have any tips for the track tomorrow?
I just pick the horse with the weirdest name.. seems to pay off about the same as studying the history/odds.
Holy crap! Shot right up to 27th place! We're on a roll now guys!

Ya know the season is a wreak when we can't even beat ottawa!  Grabovski is useless as usual, costing us a couple goals. And lebda gets nback in a game and got rite back to where he left off at playing bad and costing a goal against.  I like wilson and his coaching style, but taking out keith aulie and putting lebda in was as dumb a move as anythin I have ever seen.  Kessel should be benched for his lack of play tonite.  See if they can do anythin in the 3rd period.
Only bright light is the way schenn seems to be developing in overdrive.   Komisarek is a 4.5 million dollar turnover machine.  In bad spots too.

Wow. Offensively I thought Gabrovski was our best player in the last two games. He tried to back check but he lost the race.....Kadri is coming along fine, being the second best player on the ice.  Lebda screwed up again, pinching. I don't think he knows he is a defenseman......  The worst turnover machine has been Kaberle. Komisarek makes some mistakes but over all? Him, Schenn and Beauchein, are 3 players I wouldn't trade for anyone.  I think the leaf's inexperience shows......  We've had some great scoring chances, we just cant capitalize. We need to start scoring.
stopped watching when it went to 3-0 and went to the computer!

I do not know what games you are watching Johnny.  Komisarek is brutal.  If you want to evaluate players you have to watch them.  Not just the game.  Komisarek is playing brutal.  Giving up the puck regularly in his own end and with no offensive skill it does not bode well, and worst yet his confidence has regressed to the point he us physically soft.

Offensively grabovski is benefitting from good play by his wingers and his goals are the result of just being in the rite place at the rite time. He turns the pucks over more then most of the team combined, is weak on his feet, knocked down way to easy, and sucks defensively.  Komisarik has had some nasty turenovers, but his overall play hasn't been that bad. Especially compared to last season, and his turnover tonite to spezza, grabovski just blew it when the pass came by him.  Schenn is the leafs best player every nite out and should be an allstar this year based on his play. Lebda should be sent packing.  Kessel needs to stop playing like a pussy and start playing hockey. Kadri has been great and is gettin better each game.  They need to put pucks at the net. Just get shots and traffic in front. Good things happen. Short crisp passes, forecheck the hell outta their opponent and be more aware in their defensive zone coverage so goals like kovalev's opening goal don't happen.

The whole team is brutal, they were horrible friday night and worse last night....absolutly no chemistry or confidence.They play alittle better at home but on the road there pathetic....anyway GO LEAFS GO hahahahahaha.
I'm as big a Leafs fan as anyone but saying you wouldn't trade any of those three for ANYONE!! well thats whats wrong with the Leafs right there.
And Kessel!! Way over rated! His next hit will be this first of the season!
I trade the whole damn team for a few players that can hit a 4 x 6 with a puck! You'd think millions of dollars per that they could hit a target!

I love it when leaf fans argue over what player suck worse than others  The whole team sucks equally....that's why they are the laffs.....  3-0     5th shut out of the season  3 point out of last place  kessel  kaberle  Komisarek  Maybe they should avoid guys whos name starts with "K"
Does this mean the parade is cancelled?
In baseball a "K" means a strikeout...  Maybe the same in hockey ???
Just postponed until they win two in a row again
Hey Musky Matt - quit picking on the Leaf fans! - they got enough problems of their own already!!!  Don
If anyone is interested in seeing them play, I've got tickets for the Dec 2nd game against Oilers available. Posting is in the classified section.
I'll give you $6 per ticket (Canadian) if you pay for the parking....LOL
Dang...now that a funny one

You know what? Most of the guys I know stopped watching after two goals, and some guys dont watch at all. My brother who used to watch ALL hockey games? Watches none.  The difference these last games is that our goalie outplayed their goalie. And we have not been capitalizing on the great scoring chances. We have had some amazing scoring chances and were just not putting the puck in the net. We are missing the net(or the puck).  I agree with Irishfield. These guys are payed millions and they cant hit a net??? I bet you if playing pro hockey(The minors)wasn't so expensive? The league would have more talent......  Not to mention I bet the leafs have had the most shots blocked out of every team in the NHL. No quick release(except for Grabovski, Kuleiman and Verbeek). Our power play is back to crap(They don't shoot the puck!) and so is our penalty kill......  We need scoring.Maybe the commentator was right. Put Kadri at center and move up Verbeek. The only thing is that we would have too many centers. I dont mind getting rid of Mitchel. But I want to bring Zigomanis back(like Cherry said)(he needs to stay out of the penalty box)  and dont want to get rid of Brent. The kids got heart, but he hasn't been playing that well.  Lebda has talent but he has to remember he is a defenseman. Not a forward. He's gotta be benched.......What's goin on with Kaberle, I dont know. I'd bench him too and only use him on the power play.....  Oh ya F7Firecat and lookingforwalleye. Come up with some new material. Its getting old. We are not the Montreal Canadian fans after winning the first game in the playoffs. Trashed the town like they were going to win stanley.LOL
your not going to ask for money are you?

Hey Johnny, Verbeek doesn't play for the Leafs, he's retired. Can you leaf fans now see why there were no tears cried by Boston, Montreal and Calgary fans when Ke$$el, Komi, and Phanuef left town? Best part is Burke can't trade anyone he has aquired because that would be like admitting he made a mistake. Kaberle will just play out this season and not wave his no-trade so the Leafs will get nothing for him. He'll return to all-star form wherever he goes next year.

You keep trying to point out why kessel is terrible yet he is paid to score and that is what he is doing.If you consider his current totals terrible I suggest you look into the stats of others in the league.You might want to start with the habs as last I looked he has more goals than any of them. Are you trying to say Boston and Montreal were looking to dump kessel and komi?Not likely,why do you think they boo komi when he touches the puck in montreal?Its because he left and signed elsewhere.

Ke$$el has one more goal than Kostisyn of the Habs but Toronto has 12 fewer points than Montreal. Teams win games, Ke$$els don't. And don't worry, the only reason they don't boo Komi in Toronto is that with the Leafs defence he doesn't look that bad in comparison. Last time I looked Montreal, Boston & Calgary were all ahead of the Leafs in the standings with only two teams in the league with fewer wins than Toronto. The Leafs will finish higher than last year...probably 28th because the Oilers and the Islanders are so terrible. The upside for them is they will get high draft picks next year and Burke will sign more undrafted college players you've never heard of.

You guys take this way too serious it`s all in fun boys, now if you guys feel Phil Kessel is good value at two first and a second then great but imho he is not and yes the Montreal leader in goals has 9. PK is on pace for a 52 point season if your happy with that then that is great as well!!
